### Idiom: 阮囊羞涩
### Meaning: 阮囊亚代阮孚的钱袋；羞涩难为情。比喻经济困难。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by google_api; Corpus: cc-news
source: 自己没公职，又被当作民进党‘弃儿’、屡被‘小英门生’打压，支持者为他抱屈，但是反而可以让他接触更多蓝营或中间选民，在蓝大于绿的台东是个助力。赖坤成表示，立委初选的登记费高达75万元，最近辞官没收入、股票又套牢，阮囊羞涩，不好对外募款，企业界朋友也都不看好，家人更强烈反对，然而一股寻求在台东最后一战的强烈意愿趋势著他排除万难毅然决定投入，有信心自己一辈子累积的各领域经验、丰沛人脉、自然幽默的问政风格可以丰富台东未来4年，让台东很热闹、让国会很轻松。刘櫂豪则在脸书表示，虽然结果不如预期，也感到意外，仍然秉持正面团队的态度，尊重初选结果。
target: He has no public office, is regarded as an 'outcast' of the Democratic Progressive Party, and has been repeatedly suppressed by the 'little British protégé'. His supporters feel aggrieved for him, but on the contrary, it can allow him to contact more blue camp or middle-of-the-road voters. In a world where blue is greater than green, Taitung is a helper. Lai Kuncheng said that the registration fee for the legislative primary election was as high as 750,000 yuan. He recently resigned and had no income, and his stocks were locked up. Ruan was cash-strapped and it was difficult to raise funds from the outside world. His friends in the business world were not optimistic, and his family members were even more strongly opposed. However, once His strong will to pursue the final battle in Taitung drove him to overcome all difficulties and resolutely decide to invest. He is confident that his lifelong experience in various fields, abundant contacts, and natural and humorous political style can enrich Taitung in the next four years and make Taitung more prosperous. It was lively and made Congress very relaxed. Liu Chuhao said on Facebook that although the results were not as good as expected, he was surprised, but he still maintained a positive team attitude and respected the results of the primary election.

### Idiom: 踌躇不前
### Meaning: 踌躇迟疑不决的样子。犹豫不决，不敢前进。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by mt0-13b; Corpus: weibo
source: #时间管理# 既然时间不能复追，最明智的方式，就是忘掉过去，专注当下。既然未来还未到来，也无需杞人忧天，让自己踌躇不前。真正的善待时间，就是活在当下，吃饭时吃饭，睡觉时睡觉，做事时专心。
target: #Time management # When time cannot be reversed, the wisest way to deal with it is to forget the past and focus on the present. Since the future does not yet come, there is no need to worry about it, let yourself become anxious. When you take time, you do what you need to do.

### Idiom: 疏财仗义
### Meaning: 疏财以财物分人。讲义气，轻视钱财。多指出钱帮助遭难的人。

source: 因在家乡打死人而逃往江州，官府捉不到人便抓了李逵兄长李达顶罪坐牢数年，因此李达对这成日惹事生非的弟弟充满怨恨；李逵到江州后得戴宗收留并收编其做手下狱卒。李逵久闻宋江疏财仗义的名号，视宋江为偶像。宋江因犯重罪被发配江州，吴用写信让戴宗照应，经由戴宗引荐让李逵与宋江结识，宋江见李逵体格粗壮、性格耿直，十分欢喜。
target: Having fled to Jiangzhou after killing a man in his hometown, the authorities couldn't capture Li Kui and instead arrested his elder brother, Li Da, who was sentenced to several years in prison. As a result, Li Da harbored resentment towards his trouble-making younger brother. After arriving in Jiangzhou, Li Kui was taken in by Dai Zong, who enlisted him as a prison guard. Li Kui had long admired Song Jiang for his generosity and righteousness, considering him a role model. When Song Jiang was exiled to Jiangzhou for serious crimes, Wu Yong wrote a letter asking Dai Zong to look after him. Through Dai Zong's introduction, Li Kui met Song Jiang. Song Jiang was very pleased with Li Kui's robust physique and honest character.

### Idiom: 大喜过望
### Meaning: 谓结果比原来希望的更好，因而感到特别高兴。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by gpt4; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 本片还获颁第70届金球奖最佳动画片、第66届英国电影学院奖最佳动画片、第85届奥斯卡金像奖最佳动画片奖等奖项。《勇敢传说》这部动作冒险电影的主要场景是中世纪的苏格兰高地，讲述的联盟邓布罗赫家族的故事：当地的联盟国王佛格与艾琳诺皇后育有一名独生女梅莉达，梅莉达有著醒目的橘红色蓬松卷发，个性外向急躁，她在六岁生日时获得父亲赠送一组弓箭而大喜过望，开始勤练弓箭技巧，期许未来成为能够被众人称为一个很厉害的弓箭手，然而这与她母亲艾琳诺皇后希望女儿成为举止端庄的公主并早日出嫁的愿望相背，也使得梅莉达与母亲经常因想法不同而发生争执。某天梅莉达在树林冒险取箭期间，不巧遇见了一缕幽火，稍后一头巨大的恶魔黑熊莫杜袭击了这家人，梅莉达与艾琳诺连忙骑乘马匹逃走，佛格则和手下联合抵挡黑熊的攻势，此次事件也造成佛格永久失去一条腿。
target: This film also won the 70th Golden Globe Award for Best Animated Film, the 66th British Academy Film Award for Best Animated Film, the 85th Academy Award for Best Animated Film, and other awards. "Brave" is an action-adventure film set in the medieval Scottish Highlands, telling the story of the DunBroch family: The local King Fergus and Queen Elinor have an only daughter, Merida, who has striking orange, curly hair and an outgoing and impulsive personality. On her sixth birthday, she was overjoyed to receive a set of bows and arrows from her father, and began to practice archery skills, hoping to be recognized as a great archer in the future. However, this is contrary to her mother Queen Elinor's wish for her daughter to be a dignified princess and marry early, which often leads to disputes between Merida and her mother. One day, while Merida was adventuring in the forest to retrieve her arrows, she unfortunately encountered a will-o'-the-wisp, and shortly after, a giant demon black bear named Mor'du attacked the family. Merida and Elinor quickly rode away on horseback, while Fergus and his men resisted the bear's attack. This incident also resulted in Fergus permanently losing a leg.

target: Serious and prudent handling of unqualified party members, maintaining the advanced nature and purity of the party member team. We should adhere to the comprehensive handling of party spirit, style, and discipline, from the perspective of ideology, consolidate the foundation, improve the awareness of party spirit, enhance the ability to resist corruption and change, and cultivate the majesty and dignity of the party. Party style problems are related to the survival and death of the ruling party.

### Idiom: 日月交食
### Meaning: 指日蚀和月蚀；比喻彼此争斗，做了冤家对头。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

source: 生子二长子尧宣、次子尧德。执羔公宋宣和甲辰（1124）年登宏晦榜进士，廷诚御擢第二，累官礼部尚书，龙图阁大学士，赠太子太师从一品，南宋天文学家，推日月交食，考五纬盈缩，以纪气朔寒暑之候。撰《历仪》、《历书》、《五星测验》各一卷。
target: The second son was Yao Xuan, and the younger son was Yao De. In the year of Jia Chen (1124), he passed the imperial examination and ranked second in the court. He held various positions such as Minister of Rites, Grand Academician of the Dragon Pavilion, and was conferred the title of Grand Tutor to the Crown Prince, a first-rank official. He was an astronomer in the Southern Song Dynasty, predicting solar and lunar eclipses, studying the expansion and contraction of the five latitudes, and recording the changes of seasons. He wrote "Calendar Instruments", "Calendar Book", and "Five Star Tests", each in one volume.

target: The so-called asceticism is nothing more than asking people to unconditionally endure the yoke of authoritarian oppression. Holbach pointed out: “What makes people good is rational education, noble habits, a wise system, just laws and appropriate rewards and punishments; rather than all kinds of difficult and obscure speculations.

### Idiom: 天无绝人之路
### Meaning: 天下不会断绝人的出路，把人困死。比喻人虽一时处于绝境，但终归可以找到出路。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by gpt4; Corpus: cc-news
source: （取材自苹果官网）隔天他收到‘Find My’App通知，得知自己的Apple Watch已被开启，他也在该手表上启用‘遗失模式’并输入个人资讯，试图让拾获者可以连络他，没想到天无绝人之路，一名50岁的潜水员托16岁的女儿在Instagram对他发送讯息，表示他们在海上找到了Apple Watch，并试图为它充电，发现还能正常使用，透过‘遗失模式’找到男子连络资讯，最后他真的幸运拿回了Apple Watch他表示，不仅惊讶泡过海水的Apple Watch还能使用，人们协助找回东西并归还的热心与诚实，更让他感动不已。
target: (Sourced from Apple's official website) The day after, he received a notification from the 'Find My' App, informing him that his Apple Watch had been turned on. He also activated the 'Lost Mode' on the watch and entered his personal information, hoping that the finder could contact him. Unexpectedly, a 50-year-old diver, through his 16-year-old daughter, sent him a message on Instagram, stating that they had found the Apple Watch at sea, and tried to charge it, discovering that it was still functioning normally. Through the 'Lost Mode', they were able to find the man's contact information, and in the end, he was fortunate to get his Apple Watch back. He expressed that he was not only surprised that the Apple Watch, which had been soaked in seawater, could still be used, but also deeply moved by the warmth and honesty of the people who helped to find and return his belongings.

### Idiom: 虚情假意
### Meaning: 用虚假的情意待人；虚假的情意。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by mt0-13b; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 在《破晓》中和彼得一起帮库伦家族做证。被维多利亚转化为吸血鬼，后来因爱上维多利亚而甘心为她卖力组织并领导新生吸血鬼团队，在与库伦家族的战役中被化身为狼的赛斯杀死，死前明白了维多利亚其实是虚情假意。登场于《蚀》和《布莉的重生》中的吸血鬼，没有特殊能力。
target: In Dawn, he volunteered to help the Cullan family. He was transformed into a vampire by Victoria, who once loved her so deeply that he was willing to volunteer and lead a new vampire team, when he was transformed into a wolf by Sees, he was killed in the fight against the Cullan family, and before he died realized Victoria was just a ruse. A vampire in Dying and Bringing Out Billy, he doesn't have any special powers.

context:
### Idiom: 才兼文武
### Meaning: 指人具有文武两方面的才能。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by google_api; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 另一方面唐代延续隋代对中正制的改革，其中皇帝亲自主持选拔士人参与朝廷之不定期制科，据记载由唐高宗开始便设“军武”科考项目，至武则天时正式设立武举（702年），文武并举重现。由此唐以降之入仕士人，重新显露才兼文武、出将入相的现象，至唐代中到晚期，入仕儒学士人阶层有所复兴“士”之文武并举传统。这段时期里所产生对应“士”的概念为“儒将”（或“儒帅”）；唐代科举之士也多见有所树立军功，杜牧于晚唐曾为反驳 “科第浮华、轻薄，不可任用”，列举出房玄龄、裴度等十九个唐代科举出身的名臣，这些人物大多文武兼有建树。
target: On the other hand, the Tang Dynasty continued the Sui Dynasty's reform of the Zhongzheng system, in which the emperor personally presided over the selection of scholars to participate in the irregular system of the imperial court. According to records, the "Military and Military" scientific examination project was established starting from Emperor Gaozong of the Tang Dynasty. By the time of Wu Zetian, the Military and Military Examination Project was officially established. In 702, both civil and military officials were promoted again. From this point on, the scholars who entered the officialdom after the Tang Dynasty once again showed the phenomenon of combining talents with civil and military affairs, and becoming generals and prime ministers. By the middle to late Tang Dynasty, the class of Confucian scholars who entered the officialdom had revived the tradition of "scholars" emphasizing both civil and military affairs. During this period, the corresponding concept of "scholar" was "Confucian general" (or "Confucian commander"); in the Tang Dynasty, many scholars who took the imperial examination had established military exploits. In the late Tang Dynasty, Du Mu once refuted the idea that "the imperial examination is flashy and frivolous". , cannot be appointed", listing 19 famous officials who came from the imperial examinations in the Tang Dynasty, including Fang Xuanling and Pei Du. Most of these figures made great achievements in both civil and military affairs.

context:
### Idiom: 自命清高
### Meaning: 命认为。自以自为清高。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by google_api; Corpus: cc-news
source: 爱心人士今天会遇到可爱的小动物，有强烈的领养念头，渴望从中找到乐趣；有晨跑习惯的单身者今天会邂逅心仪的异性，恋情就在那回眸一笑中产生；工作中的你显得太专注，因而忽视同事间的问候，小心会让人觉得你很自命清高！
target: Caring people will meet cute little animals today and have a strong desire to adopt them, eager to find fun in them; singles who have the habit of morning jogging will meet their favorite opposite sex today, and love will come from looking back and smiling; you look good at work If you are too focused, you ignore the greetings between colleagues. Be careful, it will make people think that you are very conceited!

context:
### Idiom: 才兼文武
### Meaning: 指人具有文武两方面的才能。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by mt0-13b; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 另一方面唐代延续隋代对中正制的改革，其中皇帝亲自主持选拔士人参与朝廷之不定期制科，据记载由唐高宗开始便设“军武”科考项目，至武则天时正式设立武举（702年），文武并举重现。由此唐以降之入仕士人，重新显露才兼文武、出将入相的现象，至唐代中到晚期，入仕儒学士人阶层有所复兴“士”之文武并举传统。这段时期里所产生对应“士”的概念为“儒将”（或“儒帅”）；唐代科举之士也多见有所树立军功，杜牧于晚唐曾为反驳 “科第浮华、轻薄，不可任用”，列举出房玄龄、裴度等十九个唐代科举出身的名臣，这些人物大多文武兼有建树。
target: Also the Tang continued the reforms of the Yuan of centralism, where the king directly appointed aristocrats for the periodic examinations, which began with the introduction of "military" examinations in the early days of the Tang, which became officially established in the time of Ms. Wu (702). Thus the aristocrats of the Tang appeared to be more able to show both their virtues and their military abilities, until the middle and late period of the emperor, aristocrats of the aristocratic class were more able to display their virtues and their military abilities. The aristocracy of the Tang also often established their military abilities, which the aristocrats of the Tang often displayed in their military abilities.

### Idiom: 枉费心机
### Meaning: 白白地浪费心思。形容徒劳无益。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by google_api; Corpus: web
source: 不建议一上来就做太热的词，虽说大词流量多，可是投入也得多！做过SEO的朋友肯定理解这个选词的重要性，选词太冷没有人搜推广是白做，选词太热，肯定搜不到您的内容也是枉费心机，合适的词很重要，这个小马识途营销顾问认为是需要一些经验的。
target: It is not recommended to start with keywords that are too popular right away. Although big keywords have a lot of traffic, they also require a lot of investment! Friends who have done SEO must understand the importance of this word selection. If the word selection is too cold and no one will search for it, promotion will be in vain. If the word selection is too hot, your content will definitely not be found and it will be a waste of time. The right words are very important. This small Ma Shitu Marketing Consultant believes that it requires some experience.

context:
### Idiom: 能伸能屈
### Meaning: 能弯曲也能伸直。指人在失意时能忍耐，在得志时能大干一番。比喻好坏环境都能适应。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by google_api; Corpus: weibo
source: 大丈夫能伸能屈…
target: It’s okay, Nonobu Noku…

context:
### Idiom: 无以复加
### Meaning: 不能再增加。谓已至极限。语本《左传·文公十七年》：“敝邑有亡，无以加焉。”
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by google_api; Corpus: web
source: 林美美还硬着头皮不承认，结果又吃了两个大嘴巴子，人都快打傻了，老爸拿出来了那个海报，上边赫然是她的照片，不得不说，她的心酸到了无以复加的程度，自己还不是想给家里减少负担，只不过采用了这种不恰当的方式，当然如果这是发生在大城市，那种人与人之间特别冷漠的环境，也就没有什么大不了的事情，毕竟这个时代，还有几个女孩子的心灵是干净的，可家里的这些父老乡亲不同，他们一辈子也没有出过什么远门，对于外面的世界都充满了惊奇和畏惧，所以她的行为，就被扣上了不可饶恕的罪名，这让林美美十分揪心，她一时间百口莫辩，感觉自己都要被扔鸡蛋了，突然之间发现她的老爸似乎也沧桑了不少，原来不知不觉间，自己背弃的不仅仅是良心，还有家里人的殷切期待，唉，可事已至此，有什么办法呢。
target: Lin Meimei still had the courage to refuse to admit it, but she got two more big words and almost went crazy. Her father took out the poster, and it was her photo on it. It had to be said that she was extremely sad. To the extent that I didn’t want to reduce the burden on my family, I just adopted this inappropriate method. Of course, if this happened in a big city, where people were particularly indifferent to each other, it wouldn’t be a big deal. After all, in this era, there are still a few girls with clean hearts, but these folks at home are different. They have never traveled far in their lives, and they are full of surprise and fear of the outside world, so her behavior , was charged with an unforgivable crime, which made Lin Meimei very worried. She couldn't defend herself for a while, and felt like she was about to be thrown an egg. Suddenly she discovered that her father seemed to have gone through a lot of vicissitudes. It turned out that she didn't know why. Suddenly, I betrayed not only my conscience, but also the earnest expectations of my family. Alas, things have come to this, what can I do?

context:
### Idiom: 早出晚归
### Meaning: 早晨出去，晚上归来。谓整日在外。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by qwen-14b-chat; Corpus: cc-news
source: 他指平日儿子和媳妇都早出晚归，只有他们两老和两名孙女在家，他担心对方会变本加厉。不过他并没怪责男子父母，只希望警方能介入，避免再发生类似情况。
target: He mentioned that his son and daughter-in-law usually leave home early and return late every day, so only he and his wife, as well as their two granddaughters, are at home. He is worried that the other party will become more aggressive. However, he did not blame the man's parents, but only hoped that the police could intervene to prevent similar situations from happening again.
